title: 服务器如何防止工业2的各种东西爆炸破坏地形
author: 撸管别跑
txt_content: 如题 服务器不想禁核电 但也不想伤到地形

replies.author: LittleSkep
replies.txt_content:
核弹和核反应堆的爆炸范围设置 打开IC2的配置文件找到  
# Explosion power of a nuke, where TNT is 4     S:explosionPowerNuke=35 

# Maximum explosion power of a nuclear reactor, where TNT is 4     S:explosionPowerReactorMax=45 

改为

# Explosion power of a nuke, where TNT is 4     S:explosionPowerNuke=1

# Maximum explosion power of a nuclear reactor, where TNT is 4     S:explosionPowerReactorMax=1
只能解决核电和 核弹 工业TNT暂未解决只能办 表示1楼的插件无用早已测试
